## IndexLimitUnion type

Create a type literal of numbers as index strings The resulting literal will include 0 up to (N - 1)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IndexLimitUnion<N extends number, Result extends Array<unknown> = []> = Result['length'] extends N ? Result : IndexLimitUnion<N, [...Result, `${Result['length']}`]>;
```
**References:** [IndexLimitUnion](./data-schema.indexlimitunion.md)
